item.title: Leo Sayer - More Than I Can Say
item.description:
Oh- oh- Yea– yea-
I love you more than
I can say
I’ll love you twice
as much tomorrow
Oh– love you
more than I can say
Oh- oh- Yea– yea-
I miss you every
single day
Why must my life be
filled with sorrow

more than I can say
Don’t you know
I need you so?
I tell me please
I gotta know
Do you mean
to make me cry?
Am I just another guy?

more than I can say.
